page.title: 16 MUSIC IN STRATFORD
page.content: THE INHABITANTS OF LUDDINGTON AND MILCOTE,MOST OF WHOM ARE ELDERLY LISTEN TO CLASSICAL AND LIGHT MUSIC.THE NEAREST PUBLIC ENTERTAINMENT EG OPERAS, RECITALS AND BALLET PERFORMANCES ARE HELD IN THE THEATRES IN STRATFORD AND BIRMINGHAM.THERE ARE NIGHTCLUBS FOR THE YOUNGER GENERATION IN STRATFORD. IN LUDDINGTON A GROUP OF CHILDREN PERFORM A CONCERT FOR THE VILLAGERS AT CHRISTMAS AS THE "LUDDINGTON MUSIC GROUP".THERE ARE REGULAR CHOIR CONCERTS AT SHOTTERY CHURCH AND A PERFORMANCE OF A VARIETY OF FAVOURITE MUSIC CALLED "SUMMER MELODIES" IS HELD AT THE BELL INN ONCE A YEAR AND IS A COLLECTION OF THE LOCAL PEOPLESÂ£ TALENT. THERE ARE INSTRUMENTAL AND VOCAL LESSONS AT THE SOUTH WARWICKSHIRE COLLEGE OF FURTHER EDUCATION.CONCERTS ARE ORGANISED IN WHICH CHILDREN OF ALL ABILITIES PLAY COLLECTIVELY OR SOLO.
